com.nhn.android.maps

Class NMapContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nhn.android.maps.NMapContext

  • public class NMapContext
extends java.lang.Object
    NMapActivity를 상속하지 않는 Activity 에서는 onCreate()에서 NMapView 객체 생성전에 직접 생성해야함. 그리고 해당 Activity의 라이프 사이클에 따라서 아래 메소드를 호출해야함. - onCreate(), onStart(), onResume(), onPause(), onStop(), onDestroy() [examples] protected void onCreate(Bundle bundle) { super.onCreate(bundle); mMapContext = new NMapContext(this); mMapContext.onCreate(); ... mMapView = new NMapView(this); // NMapActivity를 상속하지 않는 Activity에서는 NMapView 객체 생성후 반드시 setupMapView()를 호출해야함. mMapContext.setupMapView(mMapView); } protected void onStart() { super.onStart(); mMapContext.onStart(); }

        public void setMapDataProviderListener(NMapActivity.OnDataProviderListener listener)

      • findPlacemarkAtLocation

        public void findPlacemarkAtLocation(double longitude,
                                    double latitude)
        Request a reverse geocoding (address lookup) corresponding to the location in GRS coordinates. The term geocoding generally refers to translating a human-readable address into a location on a map. The process of doing the converse, translating a location on the map into a human-readable address, is known as reverse geocoding.
        Parameters:
        longitude - longitude coordinate.
        latitude - latitude coordinate.

      • setMapTileDataProvider

        public void setMapTileDataProvider(NMapTileData.Provider dataProvider)
        Set the data provider for map tiles. This should be invoked prior to creating a NMapView instance.
        Parameters:
        dataProvider - data provider for map tiles which implements NMapTileData.Provider interface. Set null to use the built-in data provider.
